title: Grey Goo
notes: Game itself is stable, but cinematic sequence cant play, main menu is sluggish and short freeze on win/loss

title: Grey Goo
notes: Grey Goo did start after initial crash and re-start. Cinematic sequence will play under 1 FPS. In-game menu is slow to initialize but after that will be responsive as it should be. Could not start the campaign due to the cinematic issue, but started the skirmish game and it played normally with barely noticeable stutter.

title: Grey Goo
notes: Cutscenes don't work. Managed to get past it by bashing keys, played the first mission of the campaign, the game crashed when I finished the main objective.

title: Grey Goo
notes: Crashes after start, sents error to the devs but doesn't give any information on it directly to me.

title: Grey Goo
notes: Menus are slow to respond, cinematic is a black screen, gameplay itself is pretty solid.
The start of the game, lvl and main menu is (very) slow as well as saving. But otherwise the game works fine. Just if you have patience in the manues you can play without problems
